General.Name: Beyond Medical Technologies Inc
General.Description: Beyond Medical Technologies Inc. does not have significant operations. Previously, it was engaged in manufacturing and distributing personal protective equipment, such as medical grade face masks in Canada. The company was formerly known as Micron Waste Technologies Inc. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 700 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1G8
